name: Purple Eyes Killers
description:
It is simple topdown shooter. Magician Krist moved into strange dimension.
Into dimension of purple eyes-killers. He is flying through darkness.

As idea, it is variation of Space Invaders. But with arthouse visual.
And very simple in a terms of visual and gameplay.

Main colors - purple and black. Like on some early Black Sabbath albums cover.

Control:
For menu - arrows keys, SPACE, ESCAPE buttons.
Ingame - LEFT, RIGHT arrows for move,
SPACE for shoot, ESCAPE for pause menu.

Read the review:

https://dimalink.itch.io/purple-eyes-killers/devlog/244767/review-article

Important Point:

So, videogame is written in C++, thats why you need Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Package for Visual Studio 2015, 2017 and 2019, that can be downloaded from Microsoft website: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2977003/the-latest-supported-visual-c-downloads
